bio:
Jiani Lian is a Language Lecturer at NYU Shanghai. She received her MA in Asian Languages and Literatures in 2015 from the University of Massachusetts, Amherst. Before joining NYU Shanghai, Jiani worked for the Chinese language program of UMass Amherst from 2013-2015 and also for other language programs in China as a language instructor, such as the UVa in Shanghai program and the Alliance of Global Education in Beijing. Her research interests are Chinese language and Chinese literature

Research Interests

  • Chinese Language
  • Chinese Literature

Education

    University of Massachusetts, Amherst, 2015
